author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Gajentheran Marimuthu (by his mother and next friend Parai A/P Palaniappan) v Joo Yong Co (Pte) Ltd and another (Mohd Paqmi bin Arifin and another, third parties)
counsel: Shrever Ramachandran, Khan Tahaireen Tahaira and Ho Thiam Huat (Khan & Co) for the plaintiff; Cecilia Hendrick (Bogaars & Din) for the defendants; Ang Minghao and Lynette Chew Mei Lin (Stamford Law Corporation) for the third parties.
